title: OrangePi Zero Plus 2 H5 first steps
snippet: What is OrangePiOrange Pi is an open source single board computer, based on Raspberry Pi 1 but lower priced and manufactured by Shenzhen Xunlong Software CO.It can work with Android versions 4, 6 or 7.0, depending on the model, Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora, Raspbian, ArchLinux, openSUSE, OpenWrt and ot...
